hero.main-head: Welcome to the National Museum of Afghanistan
hero.main-desc: Discover Afghanistan's rich history and cultural heritage at the National Museum. Explore ancient artifacts, stunning artwork, and timeless treasures that tell the story of a vibrant and diverse civilization.
